text: Runa Laila (born 17 November 1952) is a Bangladeshi playback singer. She is one of the best-known in South Asia. She started her career in Pakistan film industry in late 1960s. Her style of singing is inspired by Pakistani playback singer Ahmed Rushdi and she also made a pair with him after replacing another singer Mala. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Recipients of Bangladesh National Film Awards Category:Bollywood playback singers Category:Bangladeshi singers Category:People from Sylhet Division
title: Runa Laila
